channel.title: BMS MP: New Hev with Head Player (W.I.P)
channel.description:
Hi, and welcome to this thread.
Well, the thing is simple, I make a player model for BMS: MP. but i don't know how to put that in BMS, is basic, i riged the new hev suit, and I put the head of the persons in the hev suit, simple.
The models will be in the workshop in the future.
Here is some pictures:
[b](Here is with the New Suit)[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/rgHrsj0.png[/img]
[b](The Player got the skins, but to the change face)[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/B5Vflyn.png[/img]
Thank you for see this, Bye! :s aint:

Hi, and welcome to this thread.

Well, the thing is simple, I make a player model for BMS: MP. but i don’t know how to put that in BMS, is basic, i riged the new hev suit, and I put the head of the persons in the hev suit, simple.

The models will be in the workshop in the future.
